scripts.start:ms:proxy-entry: cross-env TEST_CRUD_PROXY=true CRUD_CURRENT_MS=entry PORT=3004 nest start
scripts.start:ms:proxy-user: cross-env TEST_CRUD_PROXY=true CRUD_CURRENT_MS=user PORT=3005 nest start
scripts.start:ms:proxy-melon: cross-env TEST_CRUD_PROXY=true CRUD_CURRENT_MS=melon PORT=3006 nest start
scripts.start:ms:proxy-email: cross-env TEST_CRUD_PROXY=true CRUD_CURRENT_MS=email PORT=3007 nest start
scripts.test:ms: wait-on http-get://localhost:3005/crud/rdy && wait-on http-get://localhost:3006/crud/rdy && wait-on http-get://localhost:3007/crud/rdy && cross-env CRUD_CURRENT_MS=entry jest --runInBand --forceExit --testPathIgnorePatterns=client.super --testPathIgnorePatterns=-username
scripts.test:ms:proxy: wait-on http-get://localhost:3004/crud/rdy && wait-on http-get://localhost:3005/crud/rdy && wait-on http-get://localhost:3006/crud/rdy && wait-on http-get://localhost:3007/crud/rdy && cross-env CRUD_CURRENT_MS=entry TEST_CRUD_PROXY=true jest --testPathIgnorePatterns=traffic- --testPathIgnorePatterns=-username --testPathIgnorePatterns=client.super --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.clean:deep: del-cli **.js **.d.ts **.js.map !node_modules !**/node_modules && del-cli **/package-lock.json && del-cli test/cli-app/** && del-cli core/node_modules shared/node_modules db_mongo/node_modules db_postgre/node_modules client/node_modules cli/node_modules
scripts.setup:cli: cd shared && npm run compile && cd ../cli && npm run compile && npm remove -g @eicrud/cli && npm i -g ./ && cd ..
scripts.setup:tests: npm i && npm run setup:cli && eicrud export dtos && eicrud export superclient && eicrud export openapi -o-jqs && npm run setup:oapi:client
scripts.setup:typeconv: cd test && typeconv -v -f ts -t oapi -o test_exports 'test_exports/**.ts' 'test_exports/**/*.ts' && cd ..
